T02D2208:179b-1: ba lim ta aa lam k'a ra /
T02D2208:179b-3: gtor ma'i rgyan bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2208:179b-4: kun gyi grogs 'grol las kyi mchog /
T02D2208:179b-5: bkra shis bar chod sel mdzad pa //
T02D2208:179b-6: gtor ma'i las ni bdag gis bshad //
T02D2208:179b-7: phyi ngag gtor ma rgya chen 'di //
T02D2208:179b-8: rgyas par gtong ma chen po bstan //
T02D2208:179b-9: bsdus pa la sogs man ngag 'di //
T02D2208:179b-10: sgrub pa po yi don du bsdus //
T02D2208:179b-11: thams cas ldan pa'i gtor ma la //
T02D2208:179b-13: / ram gyis bsregs te yam gis bus //
T02D2208:179b-14: kham gis bkrus te dag pa las //
T02D2208:179b-15: stod pa'i dang las yam las rlung //
T02D2208:179b-16: ma dang brten pa'i dngos po dang //
T02D2208:179b-17: aa las bde skyod nang du ni //
T02D2208:179b-18: bam las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'byung //
T02D2208:179b-19: de dbus thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02D2208:179b-20: gtor ma'i rdzas ni yig 'zu [?] bcu //
T02D2208:179b-21: sku gsung thugs kyis bon dang //
T02D2208:179b-22: rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcas //
T02D2208:179b-23: thabs dang shes rab ye ges mtshan //
T02D2208:179b-24: h'um gi 'od kyis rlung sngon bskyed //
T02D2208:179b-25: 'bar dang khol bas yab yum bzhi //
T02D2208:179b-26: sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus shing sbyangs //
T02D2208:179b-27: spros pas ye shes bdud rtsi 'bebs //
T02D2208:179b-30: bde gshegs bdud rtsi spyan drangs nas //
T02D2208:179b-32: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun gyis brlab //
T02D2208:179b-33: gdan gsum ldan pa'i rin chen mdzes //
T02D2208:179b-35: rigs drug bkug ste 'od du zhu //
T02D2208:180a-2: bde gshegs klu gnyan mkha' 'gro rnams //
T02D2208:180a-3: bskyed cing ma lus dbang bskur nas //
T02D2208:180a-4: bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin rnams //
T02D2208:180a-5: bde 'tsham rim par bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D2208:180a-6: de la phyag 'tshal mchod byas na //
T02D2208:180a-7: rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags la ni //
T02D2208:180a-8: gsum dang bdun dang nyi shu gcig / ai dam
T02D2208:180a-9: ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes pa'i
T02D2208:180a-10: sngags la btags la dbul lo //
T02D2208:180a-11: ma ma sarba sha t'um aa mu ka ma hi
T02D2208:180a-12: man tsi me te sa ma ba bu gam ru
T02D2208:180a-13: bhi ra pri yam bha ksha balim ai dam gri
T02D2208:180a-14: hna kha kha kh'a hi kha'i rakta bi pa ti
T02D2208:180a-15: / aa ti kra sva ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2208:180a-16: gsang ba'i sngags des kyang mgron ma lus pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2208:180a-17: aom aa ksha ro mu kham sarba dha rma n'am /
T02D2208:180a-19: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2208:180a-20: tshigs drug ma lus kun la byin //
T02D2208:180a-23: phyin las bcol zhing smon lam gdab //
T02D2208:180a-24: spyi yi gtor ma rgya che yang //
T02D2208:180a-25: sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga ;
T02D2208:180a-26: /'bras snum khur ba la sogs la //
T02D2208:180a-27: thams cad ma spad snod du blugs //
T02D2208:180a-28: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2208:180a-29: pam las padma dkar po ste //
T02D2208:180a-30: sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2208:180a-31: phyogs skyong rigs drug 'khor dang bcas //
T02D2208:180a-32: spyan drangs gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2208:180a-36: nee rri ta ye h'um dza: b'a ya be h'um dza:/
T02D2208:180a-38: a'i sha n'a ya h'um dza:/
T02D2208:180a-39: he ta aa dhyi pa ta ye h'um dza:/
T02D2208:180a-41: spyan drangs ba lum yongs su dbul //
T02D2208:180a-42: bstod dang dngos grub blang ba dang //
T02D2208:180a-43: tham tshigs bcad bsdos byas nas //
T02D2208:180a-44: smon lam rdzogs par gdab par bya'o //
T02D2208:180a-45: gtor ma'i man ngag gzhung don 'di //
T02D2208:180a-46: sgrub pa po yi don du bris //
T02D2208:180a-47: tshig dang don gyi nges pa rnams //
T02D2208:180a-48: rigs lang bde bar gshegs pa dang //
T02D2208:180a-49: mkha' 'gro rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02D2208:180a-50: sngon byang med dang go rims bral //
T02D2208:180a-51: 'di ni bar chod sbyor ba ste //
T02D2208:180a-53: bar chos sbyor ba yongs spangs nas //
T02D2208:180a-54: dngos grub klu mo mkha' 'gros ma byung //
T02D2208:180a-55: bdag gis 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis //
T02D2208:180a-56: rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa ku spangs nas //
T02D2208:180a-57: sems can ma lus thams cad kun //
T02D2208:180b-0: gsang @180b chen lan la rab gnas nas //
T02D2208:180b-1: gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog / gtor ma'i
